title: President of the United States

fields.name: ***Nuclear War** (1x, Locked)*:
fields.value: Astrally attack everyone, including yourself, except the top 3 placers. Unlocked when you place in the top 3.

fields.name: ***Secret Service** (Passive)*:
fields.value: If you are attacked, the attack will be redirected to a random Town member besides yourself.

desc:
Post 68
***Pardon** (4x)*
Target a player during rhe day phase. They will gain immunity from being lynched. This will not be announced, however votes against your target will be cancelled/not counted.
